about

Hey, I'm Eren — I build things that turn messy workflows into reliable systems. Currently working on Sartor, an AI-assisted testing platform. I like automation, clean UX, and making computers do the boring stuff.

As a product builder focused on automation, I work on developing testing solutions that help teams ship software more reliably. My work focuses on building tools that reduce manual effort while improving software quality.

At Sartor, we're working on AI-powered testing tools. Our platform helps automate test case generation and provides insights for development teams. This approach aims to reduce manual testing overhead while improving software quality.

My work spans OCR pipeline development for document processing, workflow automation for business processes, and building software solutions that work reliably. I enjoy creating technology that solves real problems.

Want to learn more about my work? Check out my latest blog posts where I share insights about AI testing, automation strategies, and technical deep-dives into complex engineering challenges.
